titulo: Spanish Short Stories for Beginners: Volume 3: 20 Exciting Short Stories to Easily Learn Spanish & Improve Your Vocabulary (Easy Spanish Stories, Book 3)
descripcion:
It's a nightmare trying to find Spanish immersion material. We know how you feel, and we have a solution!
Most Spanish students have to go through the most difficult experiences to find useful learning material that isn’t too tough for them. As instructors, we realize this. That is exactly what inspired us to continue our highly acclaimed Spanish language learning series.
We want to ensure that students of all ages at the beginner level are given the proper tools to succeed and can have an opportunity to immerse themselves into fun and interactive stories that make learning Spanish a breeze.
Enter Spanish Short Stories for Beginners: Volume 3. You will find 20 easy-to-listen-to, engaging, and fun stories. Accompanied by summaries and questions, each fresh new tale dramatically expands your vocabulary and skyrockets your comprehension.
All stories have beginner Spanish learners in mind using relevant words and phrases you can easily use in your day-to-day conversations, complete with a summary, vocab list, and a set of clever questions to reinforce what you just learned.
With that said, it is highly recommended to have a basic understanding of Spanish to achieve maximum enjoyment and effectiveness of the lessons.
Inside, you'll discover:

Even if you have failed multiple times in the past trying to learn Spanish, these short stories will help give you the confidence boost you need to start speaking the language with natives quickly.
Act now and buy Spanish Short Stories for Beginners: Volume 3 and start learning the fun way!
 PLEASE NOTE: When you purchase this title, the accompanying PDF will be available in your Audible Library along with the audio.
